scripts.start:e2e-environment: npm run build:e2e-environment && docker-compose -f docker-compose-e2e.yml up -d
scripts.docker-compose-rebuild: docker-compose build && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d
scripts.docker-compose-rebuild-no-cache: docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d

hooks.pre-commit: cd client && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint
hooks.pre-push: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm test
